s1.title: HorstScape2
s1.p: Like Horstscape, Horstscape2 uses a jar file from Horst's website. This time it is webwindow.jar and Horst has given permission for it to be distributed with Jesktop. Apart from being a general update, this component is a self limit demo of Horst's commercial component. After 15 mins it displays a dialog warning of its demo status and then disables itself. Horst has givn permission for us to distribute the webwindow jar file with this forked version of his browser.

s1.title: License
s1.p: Horst's Browser source is free for reuse, but the rendering component is commercial for anything other than a 15 minute demo.
